name: Spiritomb
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: A Pokémon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone.

abilities.name: Cursed Whirlpool
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, your opponent’s Active Pokémon can’t retreat.

attacks.name: Cursed Drop
attacks.effect: Put 3 damage counters on your opponent’s Pokémon in any way you like.
